from this source: https://www.nuget.org/packages/EntityFramework/6.2.0

After rename "entityframework.6.2.0.nupkg" to "entityframework.6.2.0.zip",
and after unzip it,
"lib"-folder was been extracted to "\Externals\EntityFramework\v6.2"-folder
